mapper.select: SELECT contractno, lender, borrower, `type`, goods, startdate, duedate, imageurl, audiourl, description, agreed, status FROM contract c, `user` u WHERE u.userno = #{userno} AND (c.lender = u.id OR c.borrower = u.id)

SELECT contractno, lender, borrower, `type`, goods, startdate, duedate, imageurl, audiourl, description, agreed, status FROM contract c, `user` u WHERE u.userno = #{userno} AND c.lender = u.id AND status = 2

SELECT contractno, lender, borrower, `type`, goods, startdate, duedate, imageurl, audiourl, description, agreed, status FROM contract c, `user` u WHERE u.userno = #{userno} AND c.borrower = u.id AND status = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (lender, borrower, `type`, goods, startdate,duedate, imageurl, audiourl, description, agreed, status) VALUES (#{lender}, #{borrower}, #{type}, #{goods}, #{startdate}, #{duedate}, #{imageurl}, #{audiourl}, #{description}, #{agreed}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT duedate FROM contract WHERE contractno = #{contractno}
